title: 25 Minute Golf Mobility Routine (FOLLOW ALONG)
description:
WORKOUT PROGRAMS: https://www.bodyweightwarrior.co.uk/app
SUPPORT ME ON PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/bodyweightwarrior

FOLLOW ALONG PLAYLIST: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLXi7slewxuMJ5X0qMqgipbWjBGWqJnUV8

COACHING: http://www.bodyweightwarrior.co.uk/online-coaching/
JOIN THE FACEBOOK GROUP: https://www.facebook.com/groups/BodyweightWarriors
INSTAGRAM: @TheBodyweightWarrior
https://www.instagram.com/thebodyweightwarrior/

This video shares a golf focused mobility routine that works to improve hip flexibility through the internal and external rotation. It also focuses on spinal rotation and a touch of hamstring / hip flexor flexibility.

See you in the next video!
channelDescription: Honest and practical guidance for developing bodyweight strength, flexibility, handstands and more (usually coffee).

comments: This has become my every day routine. This so specific to my golf needs and it doesn’t take a lot of time. It feels great. Thank you
I won't ever skip ads on your video again. You have help me so much with your vídeos.
Enjoying this routine on a regular basis in preparation for the upcoming golf season.  My golf instructor says I need to stretch my shoulders to help with the back swing.  Please and thank you!
Definitely like to see more golf specific stretching. Thanks for this one though
Good stuff. Just turned 43. I'm slowly accepting the fact that this stuff is a non-negotiable part of my life moving forward
